snippet: Joe Johnson, acquired by the Nets from Atlanta, is eager to shed his reputation for commanding the basketball and be the complementary player he was with Phoenix.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets guard Joe Johnson is eager to shed his reputation for commanding the ball and return to being the complementary player he was earlier in his career.
lead_paragraph: Joe Johnson, acquired by the Nets from Atlanta, is eager to shed his reputation for commanding the basketball and be the complementary player he was with Phoenix.

headline.seo: For the Nets’ Joe Johnson, No More Iso-Joe
headline.main: As a Net, Johnson Is Relearning to Share
headline.print_headline: As a Net, Johnson Is Relearning to Share
